headline: Most N.B.A. Players Are Vaccinated, but Skeptics Speak Out
snippet: More than 90 percent of players have received at least one dose of the vaccine, but some, like Nets guard Kyrie Irving, won’t say if they have been or plan to be vaccinated.
abstract: More than 90 percent of players have received at least one dose of the vaccine, but some, like Nets guard Kyrie Irving, won’t say if they have been or plan to be vaccinated.

headline: Another Crisis at the Border
snippet: Thousands of Haitians seeking refuge in the U.S. are being turned away and deported at a time when their nation is unstable and unsafe.
abstract: Thousands of Haitians seeking refuge in the U.S. are being turned away and deported at a time when their nation is unstable and unsafe.

headline: This Is No Way to End a Pandemic
snippet: Getting first shots in arms, globally, is more important than any booster program.
abstract: Getting first shots in arms, globally, is more important than any booster program.

headline: Wole Soyinka Is Not Going Anywhere
snippet: The Nobel laureate, whose new novel, “Chronicles From the Land of the Happiest People on Earth,” is his first in nearly 50 years, refuses to back down when he senses that his homeland’s freedom is under threat.
abstract: The Nobel laureate, whose new novel, “Chronicles From the Land of the Happiest People on Earth,” is his first in nearly 50 years, refuses to back down when he senses that his homeland’s freedom is under threat.
